SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.text:
Beg pardon, but what sort
of things do ye do here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien is in our midst! It's been a
great many cycles since an outsider last
visited us, so I suppose I could spare the
time to explain what we do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.text:
This is the laboratory of Green Division,
where we research various forms of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.text:
If ye are looking into life,
that won't involve me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.text:
No, I suppose it wouldn't.
We don't concern ourselves
with mechanized beings here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.text:
In fact, all the food, medical supplies,
and biologically derived fuels consumed
within the base are created here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.text:
So ye perform many practical
tasks in addition to research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.text:
Yes, although research remains our division's
primary mission—which is why we have little
time to waste engaging with aliens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.text:
Currently, I am only speaking with you because
I have an idle moment while I await the receipt
of some quantum cat specimens. Speaking of
which, why haven't they arrived yet?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.text:
According to my database, quantum cats
are beings that live in the space between
dimensions. Sadly, I cannae access any
further details about them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.text:
I can't help but find myself intrigued
by this database of yours, alien.
Could that be your version of a heart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.text:
If you like, I could easily disassemble you
to examine this heart that concerns you so.
What do you say? Are you interested?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.text:
N-nae, I'm fine—but cheers for the offer.
Oh, but look at the time! I'd best be off.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Hi. I um... Well, I actually wanted
to ask you a favor? Kind of?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, I'm one of the researchers
from Green Division, by the way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I must ask that ye refrain
from disassembling me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.text:
What!? Oh no, I'd never do that!
The favor actually involves catching
some quantum cats that ran away from
me down on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Your overseer mentioned earlier that she was
waiting for quantum cat specimens; the fact
they did a runner would explain the delay.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Exactly! Those naughty cats ran away just as
I was preparing them for an experiment.
And if my division overseer hears of this...
Oh, I don't even want to think about it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.text: I can't even imagine what she might do if she found out I lost her cats!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.text:
Last time I screwed up, she made me participate in
an experiment involving an elixir that was supposed
to make you smart, but I'm so dumb that not even
that could—wait, that doesn't matter right now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
I've very little data on quantum cats,
aside from the fact they inhabit the
space between dimensions.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
There are two escaped cats: one named
Schrö, and the other named Dinger. But there is also only one escaped cat.
They are multiple, yet singular.
Deathless, yet not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Quantum cats possess a mimetic ability
that causes other life-forms around them
to assume their appearance. As such, we have reports that the cat—
or cats—are hiding among fiends who now
ALSO appear to be quantum cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I asked a couple other lab workers to help
me capture the cats—er, or cat—but they all
ended up being attacked by monsters.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Diva_No5

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh, I'm sure you'll be fine! So according to our research, quantum cats
are influenced by magnetic fields.
They cause real cats to face to the right,
and illusory cats to face to the left.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Because each possesses a different spin.
Not that this will help us capture them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Yes, well, now that I've explained all of that,
I'm coming with you. You wouldn't be able to
use the lift without me, is the thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.text:
Oh, and my name's Qu Magis,
but you can call me Mags.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text: Is that not one of your quantum cats?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Did you verify which direction
it was facing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text: What was the direction of the spin...?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.text:
Is the cat we captured
truly a quantum cat?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.text:
It says 'Dinger' on its collar,
so it must be. Oh, what a relief
that we caught the right cat!

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.text:
This is a far more unique life-form
than its appearance would suggest.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.text: Ah, but the quantum cat you see isn't real. It's the cat you don't perceive that is the actual cat—one living on the boundary between dimensions.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.text:
So this cat is effectively an illusion, and
the real cat exists in the space between
dimensions. But how is it possible we've
captured an illusion, then?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.text:
It's the collar. It's made of orichalcum,
which for some reason makes it possible
to interact with quantum cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.text:
This seems like a very different life-form
than the sort Green Division typically
uses in its experiments.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh yes! We have much to learn from them.
Why, they could easily lead to a new era
of massive technological discoveries!

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_080.text:
And what sort of technologies do
ye anticipate a high-energy being
like this might be used for?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.text: Let me turn that question around: What do you think we in Green Division are so busy researching life-forms for?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.text:
The ultimate goal of biological research
is likely achieving eternal life.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.text:
Oooh, that's a great guess!
Yeah, I've kind of got the same hunch
that might be the end goal in all this.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.text:
That said, I don't believe it's possible
for conventional life-forms to adopt
the characteristics of quantum cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.text:
Huh. Yeah, probably not. But honestly,
though? I don't think being immortal
would be very much fun.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.text:
So long as mechanical life-forms are continuously
maintained, it is possible for them to operate
indefinitely; this state of being is neither fun
nor unfun in and of itself.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Let's see... The collar says 'Schrö'!
Oh, wow, what a relief.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text: Its spin is the opposite of Dinger's.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text: Well, they are the same cat, after all. There's two of them, yet just one. Dead, yet living. Existing, yet not.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
If placed at the same location,
I expect they would annihilate each other.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
The fact they exist as a single cat and yet
two cats means they exist in a quantum state—
and are therefore connected at a quantum-
mechanical level.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
I think we're doing something like trying to
control their state with orichalcum—to find out
if it's structured in a way that we can extract
energy from them without it diminishing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
That sounds analogous to developing
a perpetual motion machine.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.text:
Ha ha! Oh, I don't have the faintest
idea about most of this stuff.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.text:
The recapture of the quantum
cat or cats is complete.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.text:
Energy levels in the area
are returning to normal.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.text:
Indeed they are. This is because the
influence of the cats' quantum field
has dissipated.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.text:
And the monsters have disappeared
as well, which is grand.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll go back to the lab and
drop off the cat... Er, or cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.text:
I'm sure your overseer will
be chuffed to hear it.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.text:
That was a monster that dinnae
resemble a cat at all.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.text:
Yes, they seem to be projecting their
existence through space-time? That's why
it changes their left-right directionality.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.text:
We speak of the cats in the multiple,
but in truth, they're singular.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.text: And it's possible that anyone other than the two of us would actually perceive us as cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_040.text:
I don't believe I appear
to be a cat.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.text:
That was another of the
mimetic monsters, aye?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.text: Would it be possible to verify the catness of these creatures with Nepeta cataria, or catnip? I hear felines simply love it.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.text:
As I don't have full access to my database,
I'm afraid I lack the specific details.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.text:
That was another of the
mimetic monsters, aye?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.text:
Aye, your overseer is likely
growing quite impatient.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.text:
Oh, you have no idea.
She is terrifying.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.text:
That was another of the
mimetic monsters, aye?

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.text:
The cats really did manage to project
their appearance onto the monsters...

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.text: It makes me wonder if quantum cats are simply creatures onto which normal cats have projected their appearances.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.text:
Were that true, it wouldn't be possible
to conclude anything about them from
observational data alone.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.text:
But it DOES make for a very
interesting thought exercise!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Did ye deliver the quantum cats
to your overseer, love?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I did, thanks to you. Now our biological
research can move forward without issue.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm pleased that I was able
to be of some use to ye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
But, um, seeing as you were such a helpful
alien, do you think I could maybe ask you
for another favor? I mean, if I need it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
If ye believe I could be of help,
feel free to ask.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.text: A passcode? Where did you get that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_010.text: It was lying on the ground.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That's a passcode for unlocking one of
the cryosleep pods on the lower floor—
and a rather old one, at that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Pod 007, is it? Yes, it seems a patient in that
pod has been waiting for a medical treatment
to be developed since...cycle 31!? By atoms,
it must be one of the progenitors!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
A member of the generation that established
Delta Base. Why, someone from that time would
likely know the answers to all the great
mysteries of this place!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.text:
May I take this code, alien? A medical treatment
for this patient's condition has long since been
developed, but I don't dare thaw a progenitor
without first informing the Council of Overseers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Please, alien. Give me the code.
You've been quite helpful so far,
and it would sadden me if I had
to take it from you by force.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I committed the code to my memory banks.
Should I use it to awaken whoever is inside
this cryosleep capsule?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_030.text: Nae, this is a poor idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_000.text:
I entered the code.
The capsule is opening.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Nnngh... Is this...a cryopod?
Ah, I see. I've finally awakened.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I'll not let you dastards have your way!
Not now, and not ever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Wait a moment, please!
Where are ye going!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh my days. Did I make
a terrible mistake?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.text: What in the...? Pod 007 is open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.text: And it's empty! What's going on!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.text:
I cannae imagine what's will happen next.
This is actually a wee bit exciting!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.text:
What became of the matter
regarding Capsule 007?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, the progenitor escaped
the pod and is currently missing. I don't suppose YOU know
anything about this, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.text:
A shame. For if we do not find the progenitor
soon, their ailment will progress to the point
where treatment is no longer possible.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_040.text: I hope ye locate them soon.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.text:
In his haste, the progenitor may have
overlooked the direness of his condition.
Sadly, I'm not a medical unit.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.text:
The cryosleep pod of a progenitor?
Boy, you've really poked the damn
hornet's nest this time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.text:
This could threaten everything
that Delta Base has become.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.text:
And yet, the person inside that pod could be
the only living witness to Delta Base's history.
Their cultural and historical value is a thing
beyond all measure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Which is why I propose that the
Council of Overseers leave them
frozen here indefinitely.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Then Administrative Division will
take the appropriate measures.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Understood. I will see to it that
their cryosleep is not interrupted.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.text:
I have also changed the passcode
as a security precaution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.text:
With the code changed,
I cannae open the pod.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.text:
Ye are the progenitor who 
emerged from capsule 007.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.text:
And you are the one who awakened me.
You have my thanks, for at long last,
I can now resume my work.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.text:
That is the Connectivity Gate.
Where will ye go, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.text:
To the Conjoined Worlds,
where my task awaits me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_040.text:
And the progenitor is gone!
Well, that's a proper shame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey there. So is this some kind
of laboratory or something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien. Thankfully, we have a researcher
whose duties include interfacing with those
from outside the division, so let me just... Oh, bother. I don't see her anywhere. Tsk!
Well then, I guess it falls to me, the
overseer of the entire Green Division,
to assuage your idle curiosity... Joy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.text:
I apologize. It was not my intent
to cause ye any trouble or—

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.text:
Just make sure you pay attention!
Now then, we in Green Division
conduct biological research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.text:
Our field is a broad one, spanning everything
from the life-forms that live here on Delta Base
to the interdimensional beings that exist in
the space between worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.text:
We cover everything from organic chemistry to
life sciences to particle physics, and demand
an incredibly wide breadth of knowledge—
certainly the largest in all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.text:
Just so, which is why I'm proud to say every
member of Green Division is an exceptional
researcher! ...Well, save for a small few.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.text:
If you like, I could easily disassemble you
to examine this heart that concerns you so.
What do you say? Are you interested?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.text:
N-nae, I'm fine—but cheers for the offer.
Oh, but look at the time! I'd best be off.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.text: Oops! Oh dear, I'm so sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, it's nothing. Or, well... Okay, here it is: on the lower level, we're
currently cultivating and researching these
otherworldly vegetables called monophids
that we use to make food and medicine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Do these otherworldly vegetables differ
from the normal kind, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, very much so. In fact, you have to
be REALLY careful with the type and
amount of fertilizer you give them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But I sort of...didn't do that?
And now they've turned into monsters
that are propagating exponentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Considering their current rate of growth,
they'll soon overrun the entire lower level!
And if Green Division's overseer happens
to find out about this...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, I can't even imagine what she'll do!
Last time I messed up, she injected me with
an experimental mushroom extract that was
supposed to let you go days without sleep! And the time before that, she...
Well, you get the idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
But say, you're an alien, right? Would you 
be willing to help me exterminate our now
rapidly expanding monophid population?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Agricultural support is outside the range
of my intended functionality, but I'll
still do what I can to help ye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Thank you so much! Oh, and I should mention
that the monophids have developed an abnormal
property in which they scream when they perceive
danger. So, um, be careful of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.text: Aye, that's no bother for a robot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Well it bothers the heck out of not-robots like me!
In fact, according to past records, all of the
research teams that tried to deal with these
kinds of infestations suffered MASSIVE casualties.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Still, if we could emit something at the same
wavelength as the monophids' screams,
we might be able to cancel them out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.text:
That's a brilliant plan, love.
Oh, but I do enjoy applied science!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.text:
...Er, Mags? Why do I feel we've
done something like this before?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the monophids. They are
indeed emitting sound waves over a
rather wide frequency band.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I thought I was prepared for it,
but it still feels like my head
is splitting apart!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I've never seen flowers do this.
How very odd.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.text:
They are indeed emitting sound waves over
a rather wide frequency band, although it has
largely been cancelled out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.text: We should be able to gather them now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.text:
We have retrieved the first monophid.
This is a very interesting plant!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Screaming aside, monophids have a lot
of vitality—and their seeds are quite
rich in various nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.text:
So all this trouble is just so
ye can gather some edible seeds?
It seems quite the risky endeavor.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this time it was my own dumb fault
for messing up the fertilizer. And the
reproductivity was probably a result of
all the selective breeding! Heh heh...heh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.text:
But do you know why Green Division is
trying to uncover the secrets of life?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_070.text:
I assume ye are trying to achieve
immortality of some sort.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.text:
Yup. But if they did figure it out,
it'd probably require a weird surgery.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.text:
Nooo, don't even joke about that!
Let's just hurry on, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Even when I know it's coming,
it still disturbs me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, so don't let anyone know
what I'm about to tell you, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_020.text:
I cannae make that promise until
I've heard what ye have to say.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.text:
As far as I know, this is the first time
we've dealt with an outsider like you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.text:
But on the lower level, there's apparently
someone who isn't a member of Green Division
or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.text:
Like a ghost or something, I guess.
And while I kind of want to see them,
I also kind of...don't?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.text:
Whether or not one is able to perceive
spiritual life-forms depends on whether
one believes in their reality.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.text:
Look, I just want to get that last
monophid before the ghost appears!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.text: Then clearly ye DO believe, love.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
I can feel that monophid's sound waves
reverberating throughout my body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Actually, I think there's a part of
me that's starting to enjoy it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Aye, I'm also feeling their vibes.
...Wait, did I just say 'vibes'?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_000.text: That is the third. We are finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.text:
I didn't want to mention this earlier,
but a colleague of mine was actually
killed by one of the monophids.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Yeah, I didn't want to worry you while we were
hunting them down. Er, but now that I know you,
I bet you would have helped me even if you HAD
known, 'cause that's the kind of alien you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.text:
If ye knew this job was so risky, ye should
have come to me sooner. Ye humans really
need to learn to value your lives more!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_000.text:
I believe we've captured 
all of the monophids.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, I've got a lot of processing to do
on these guys, so I'm going to head back
to the upper level. Thanks again, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you so much for helping me
with that whole monophid thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.text:
We only managed to recover one of them,
but that's still one more than none!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Um, so if anything else goes wrong,
can I ask for your help again?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.text:
If ye believe I could be of help,
feel free to ask.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Thanks. Oh, and here's your reward
for helping me out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_050.text: I hope my efforts were adequate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.text:
We managed to recover two monophids.
That's wonderful!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.text:
We recovered all the monophids,
which should ensure that we're able
to go forward with our research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, we had to eradicate all the monophids,
but I'll try to recover the specimens from
the carcasses; we grew them in good soil,
so even dead, they're full of nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.text:
I guess this turned out to be more about
exterminating monophids than recovering them.
But hey, you still get a reward for that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.text:
Beg pardon, but I heard there was a rather
dodgy research facility located around here.
Might this be it, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, look. It's the alien. Also, what you consider to be 'dodgy' is,
in fact, reputable and cutting edge research
spanning everything from the life sciences
to quantum mechanics.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.text:
Cutting-edge research on
dodgy life-forms, is it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.text:
Hardly. The research of fiends and monsters
falls under the purview of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.text:
But our research is not merely academic
in nature; we are equally devoted to
researching practical ways to improve
the quality of life here in Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.text:
So this is more than a
simple research facility.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.text:
Quite right. Green Division's researchers
are the best of the best, and they undertake
their work with meticulous care.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.text:
In fact, I'm planning to begin an experiment
involving some new specimens shortly—
assuming they ever arrive, that is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.text: I do hope there hasn't been another mistake. Ugh. I've half a mind to make a research specimen out of her one of these days...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.text:
If you like, I could easily disassemble you
to examine this heart that concerns you so.
What do you say? Interested?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.text:
N-nae, I'm fine—but cheers for the offer.
Oh, but look at the time! I'd best be off.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh dear, your bottle broke.
I hope ye weren't harmed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh no! They escaped!
The tsuchinoko have escaped!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Tsuchinoko: an unverified animal species,
or cryptid. Further details unavailable—and 
not because my memories are sealed away.
Further data simply does not exist.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
But ye claim they do exist and were inside
of your jar? Fascinating if so, though they
seem to have abandoned the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Yeah, and that's a HUGE problem!
I'm a researcher for Green Division,
and if the overseer finds out I lost
our tsuchinoko specimens...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Yes, exactly! Why, just the other day, 
she almost made me do a gene transplant
with an electric eel!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Er, but I guess that's beside the point.
Will you please help me recover them?
I mean, it WAS kind of your fault.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
There were three specimens in the jar,
and they probably fled to the lower level.
Don't worry, I'll come with you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Also, tsuchinoko snore when they sleep,
so that'll be the easiest time to try
and recapture them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Here, let me activate that
lift over there for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Once again, please accept my
most heartfelt apologies.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_020.text: It appears a wee bit miffed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_060.text: Nae, best to let it be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_020.text:
Its metabolism has slowed.
It is sleeping.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
But we still have two to go.
I'm counting on you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Will ye use these tsuchinoko
in your research, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Never mind that. Listen, do you find it
at all strange that you ALSO call these
creatures tsuchinoko?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
I suppose it's something of a coincidence
that we use the same name, but I don't
believe there's any greater meaning to it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Except that it would be proof they exist
on multiple worlds—and yet, there are
no records of anyone ever releasing them
into another world!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.text:
I suppose they might jump into other dimensions
when they sense danger? I mean, that would also
explain why we haven't been able to get accurate
data on their native habitat or population.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.text:
I fail to see how hopping about dimensions
would explain their name being the same.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.text:
Well, perhaps our habit of calling them tsuchinoko
spread to other worlds—or maybe a member of the
civilization that named them found their way here.
Either explanation could work, honestly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.text:
And if some sort of internal organ allows them to
jump between dimensions instead of magic or tech,
it would be possible for the same population to
exist on multiple worlds at once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.text:
That suggests their unique shape is the result
of an evolution that made it possible for
them to travel through conjoined worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.text:
If the same individual tsuchinoko truly did
exist on multiple worlds at once, that would
make them living, breathing, interdimensional
teleportation devices!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.text:
And THAT means researching their species
could provide valuable clues for the
development of teleportation technology!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.text:
That's proper science right there, love!
Ye have my respect for it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.text:
Aw, thank you so much
for saying that! You know, if we ever do get our
interdimensional teleportation up
and running, I'd love to visit your
world one day, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.text:
Alas, I don't know where
my home world is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.text:
Also, I know I'm always going on about
myself, but I really would like to hear
more about your world next time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_170.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_170.text:
Ye were clearly not paying attention
to my responses at all—but cheers
for the sentiment all the same!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.text:
These creatures are quicker than one
would expect from their appearance!
I'll need to update my data files.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_020.text: It appears a wee bit miffed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching this
guy without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to grab it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.text:
We captured the tsuchinoko!
...It's rather cute, actually.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.text:
So, um, alien? Were you serious about
wanting to keep one of these?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.text:
I've never raised a living being before—
and probably for good reason. But I would
still like to give it a go at some point.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.text:
I see. Sadly, these specimens are very precious
to us, so we can't let you take one with you.
Also, no photographs, flash or otherwise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.text:
I need no photographs; I was recording several
parameters of biological data in real time.
But I'll delete them now that we've got them
all safe and secure... DELETING.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.text:
Er, are you all right, alien?
You're mumbling. A lot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_020.text: It appears a wee bit miffed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.text:
Then this could be our
chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.text:
We captured the tsuchinoko.
I believe that's the last of them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.text:
Yep! We're all done. Now I'm gonna
run on up and get these processed,
so I'll see you later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks again for your help
with the tsuchinoko.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm glad I was able to help resolve
the situation, seeing as it was all
my fault to begin with.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.text:
We were able to capture all
three in healthy condition.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.text:
Because they were captured
while asleep, aye?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm just glad our research into the life
of the tsuchinoko can proceed smoothly.
Thanks again for the help!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.text:
I'm pleased we were able to resolve this
without your overseer finding out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.text:
Not all of them made it
back to us unharmed...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.text:
I know they were angry little things,
but it's still a proper shame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, I don't think that should have
a significant effect on our research.
Thank you for your help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.text:
I'm pleased we were able to resolve this
without your overseer finding out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.text:
Unfortunately, all three of them
aren't in the best of shape.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, it's not like we had a choice,
so thanks all the same, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.text:
I'm pleased we were able to resolve this
without your overseer finding out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you for helping to retrieve those
rare specimens, alien. All of us in Green
Division owe you a debt.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.text: So ye are aware of the situation?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I am—and I apologize for the trouble
my researcher Qu Magis caused for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Um... Thank you for
your help, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The overseer was quite furious with me.
She made it clear that since my negligence
put all of Delta Base at risk, I should have
reported the incident to her immediately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
On that topic, alien, I wonder if you
might be willing to join us for a
selective-breeding experiment?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
As I am not a life-form myself, I'm not
an appropriate candidate for any sort
of selective-breeding experimentation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
This is not about breeding you, alien.
We're seeking to fuse the specimens
you helped recover with a magical bee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We intend to fuse their individual
characteristics to create a new
and beneficial life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: As I would hate for your impression of Green Division to be tainted by certain members of our research team, you may consider this a chance to see the kind of work we really do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Nae, ye misunderstand!
I think Mags is lovely!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.text:
Then please go observe our experiment.
You can find it on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_020.text: I need a wee bit more time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Beginning selective-breeding verification
experiment A, iteration 880.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to use the inherent abilities
of quantum cats to increase the bee's
propagation rate and honey production.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
We once more stand at the brink of
uncovering a core mystery of nature
and enriching our own way of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I do hope this goes well;
I'm quite nervous about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.text:
We can instantly create new life-forms
by combining specimens that have been
placed in these fusion pods.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.text:
And by applying our teleportation
technology, we turn them into a
new, single being!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the quantum cat and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.text:
When you hear the pod ding,
the work will be complete.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
This will be a brilliant fusion of life
sciences and quantum mechanics!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
WE MUST       WE WILL
     TURN THIS   INTO
   NEST

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh no... No no no no no... Not good! We overshot the domesticity
level and made it intelligent!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
KREE KREE KREE.
FLEE FROM US.
FLEE. FLEE. FLEE.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
So on a scale of complete success to
utter failure... Maybe a six? Anyway, this is getting dangerous!
Let's get out of here!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Ye birthed a new life-form!
Incredible work!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the medicinal properties
of monophids and propagation rates of
honeybees, as well as increasing the
yields of honey and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic
elements of the monophid and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the special faculties of
tsuchinoko and propagation rates of honeybees,
as well as increasing the yields of honey
and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the tsuchinoko and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.text:
I'm not sure what went wrong, but they
appear to have fused into a rather
dangerous-looking creature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.text:
...Mags? What culture solution
did you use in the pods?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.text:
My instructions were to use formulation 098.
But sadly, I cannot afford to waste
precious time chastising you now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.text:
It is possible the specimens have begun
constructing a hive on the lower floor.
Should they gain even more intelligence,
it could put all of Delta Base in danger.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Also, we need to give our new
life-form a name! Um, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Our target is a failed experiment officially
designated as 'Rogue Species 303.'
We in Green Division must find some way
to respond to the danger this swarm poses.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.text:
If all of Delta Base is threatened,
would it not make sense to involve
the other divisions?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.text:
She's right! I mean, Red Division DOES
pride itself on handling odd life-forms.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.text:
*sigh* I suppose Green Division cannot
permit our pride to get in the way of
our greater responsibility. We must confer with Red Division.
Are you up to the task, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.text: Yeah, um, I don't... I mean, I'm not... No? Er, that is to say, I'm not entirely sure I'd be capable of having a productive conversation with Red Division, considering how, you know... scary they are? I mean, they're basically the war division of Delta Base, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.text:
I've collaborated with members of
Red Division before, and am happy to
do so again if it would be of use.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.text: Very well, alien. Good luck. And as for you, Mags, I expect you to make yourself extremely useful. In the meantime, I will remain here and continue to monitor Rogue Species 303. Dismissed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.text:
We have been briefed by Red Division's
overseer. We know Delta Base is in
trouble due to Rogue Species 303.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Um, well, I guess our fusion of a new life-form
miiight have caused some unexpected genes to
manifest? Ones that draw quite strongly from
the honeybee side of its genetic composition?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Is there a chemical that would be
effective against them, perhaps?
An insecticide or somesuch?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.text:
Unfortunately, we don't know how a rogue
species might react to insecticide. If we
inadvertently made them stronger, they could
easily end up being completely unmanageable.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.text:
Then we've no choice but to
sort them one by one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.text:
A life-form of this type will have a queen.
Kill this queen. This will stop them.
Their proliferation will cease, halting
any further infiltration of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, but the thing is, we've yet to...
observe a queen? Or anything like one? I mean, it's also possible our security
cameras are just too far away for us
to make that kind of distinction!
That could be it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.text:
If we can get near the queen,
my sensors can identify her.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.text:
You need pheromones. Apply them to yourself.
This will cause the life-forms to accept you
as an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.text:
Good idea! We used formulation 507
for the culture solution, so we should
be able to make a pheromone out of the
monster specimens we derived it from.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.text:
I have applied the pheromones.
Rogue Species 303 will now
consider you an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Ach! It smells like the floor of a pub!
Will this horrid odor not drive the
life-forms away from us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, you're not smelling the pheromone!
You're actually smelling the bodily fluids 
of the monster specimen it was derived from. Er, which is its urine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.text: Oh! Then we've nothing to worry about.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.text:
Red Division hopes you succeed.
If you do not, we have a failsafe.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.text:
If we DO botch this, our standing in
Delta Base would plummet! And since
I'm the one who caused all this trouble,
I'd have no choice but to resign.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.text:
Why do you do this, alien?
This is not your burden.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.text:
Everyone on Delta Base has been proper
nice to me, and I'm pleased to be able
to repay that kindness.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.text:
I sympathize with your fate, alien.
Good luck. Return victorious.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_015_CUT_001_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_015_CUT_001_010.text:
Should your species multiply further,
our situation would become dire.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.text:
The pheromone is tricking
their sensory organs!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.text:
So they believe us to be their comrades?
Oh, but that's just smashing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.text:
Huh. I guess there's no
queen around here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.text:
This pheromone thing's
really doing the trick!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_020.text:
I'm not getting any readings
suggestive of a queen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.text:
Things seem to be proceeding differently now.
Have the pheromones worn off, perhaps?
My sensors are unable to tell.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.text:
My readings indicate
the queen is nearby!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.text:
That should be all of them, but I guess
the queen wasn't here after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.text:
My sensors are picking up an unusual
sound similar to wingbeats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.text:
It's the queen! She must have received
a signal that we killed her underlings!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.text:
We purged all the creatures from the hive,
including the queen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Thank you for your assistance, alien.
It is much appreciated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.text:
And what have you learned of
Rogue Species 303, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, tons! And I also documented
everything, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.text:
Then perhaps we can consider this
experiment a stepping stone rather
than a failure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.text:
Which means the first batch was sacrificed
in the name of scientific progress.
Is this an acceptable outcome?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_070.text: A new rogue species has appeared!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.text: Apologies. It is me. Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.text:
Our confusion is understandable, love:
ye do share 95 percent of your DNA
with the creatures, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.text:
I have a message, Madam Overseer.
The other division overseers await
your report on this incident.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.text:
Understood. Then I guess this
is farewell for now, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.text:
This whole thing was my fault.
I'm so, so, so, SOOO sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.text:
It's unlike ye to apologize
in such a fashion, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, you noticed that too, alien?
Yeah, my boss sorta...ordered me
to apologize to you? But now that everything worked out,
I don't regret a thing. Plus, I'm sure
all the excitement has made your visit
to Delta Base really fun!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.text:
While I valued the experience, I wouldn't
classify it as 'fun.' Could such feelings
still be an aspect of my missing heart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.text:
Oh yeah, they gotta be—heck, sometimes I
don't understand my own heart either!
Anyhoo, if anything else comes up,
I'll come to you for help again, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.text:
As much as I treasured our new experiences,
love, I'm not looking to adding more of them
to my to-do list.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.text:
I understand you've had to endure much
due to Mags's procedural and general
incompetence, alien, and I apologize.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, it's fine; to a visitor like myself,
the new experiences I shared with
Mags were actually quite valuable.
I'm quite grateful to her, in truth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, speaking of life on Delta Base,
you'll be welcome in Green Division
should you choose to remain here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.text:
But on another topic, while we were dealing
with this latest incident, we learned there
is an individual confined on the lower level—
one that might even be an alien like yourself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh dear. Does that mean I might
be captured as well?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.text:
For Green Division's part, we have only
gratitude for your work here and wouldn't
dream of apprehending you. But I can't speak to the plans of
the other divisions, so it would
behoove you to show caution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.text:
Regardless, I will make arrangements
for you to meet this other alien.
Whether or not you do so is up to you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I don't believe that word is
appropriate for a casual greeting.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, hell! Sorry about that—didn't mean
to offend. In fact, I've actually been
waiting for you to show up! So this is the research area of Red Division.
I'm the division overseer, and this is my
data-management specialist, Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.text: And ye have been waiting for me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Relax, alien! We'll get to that. Right then! So Red Division is currently
engaged in the collection of life-form data
from numerous worlds. Dangerous life-forms
in particular. Monsters, essentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.text: See, the examiners and researchers of Delta Base have been dispatched to all sorts of worlds filled with all kinds of nasty, toothy monsters. It's Red Division's job to gather data about said monsters and come up with countermeasures—and let me tell you, there is a ton of data to wrangle.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I am Shi Kat. The data-wrangler.
The pitiless overseer is constantly
increasing my workload. I cannot begin
to estimate when I might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Ha ha ha! C'mon now, Kat! Let's not go
airing our dirty laundry to the alien! Now where was I...? Oh, right! Data. Yeah,
so once you understand a monster's nature,
you'll know whether fight or flight is the
best choice, and also how best to go about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Unknown monsters. Fiends. Phantoms.
These do we analyze. These do we classify.
There is science in turning knowledge
into usable data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We're well aware, thank you! *sigh*
Sorry about that, alien. My colleague
here tends to be a bit thickheaded.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Aye, I understand. But the part where
ye have been waiting for me...?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, right! That! Okay, so when you
showed up here, it actually triggered
a momentary power failure that wiped out
vital portions of our monster-data library.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_120.text: I dinnae mean to cause any trouble.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Ha ha ha! Well, too bad,
'cause ya totally DID!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Anyway, since this is all your fault,
we need you to go to the lower level
and track down the biochip that has
our backup monster data on it. All we know is that it's inside a container,
but just open 'em all and I'm sure you'll
eventually run across it. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
We can restore the erased
data with that biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I'll give you permission to take the lift
to the lower level. Oh, but be careful down
there! The electromagnetic gates have sorta
been on the fritz lately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Electromagnetism can be very dangerous
to me. What is the nature of this gate?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Aw, it's just a gate that delivers a
massively painful and dangerous electrical
shock whenever something touches it. We built the thing in case any of our
nastier research specimens ever got out.
Can't be too careful, am I right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Ha ha ha! Yeah, you probably should be—
but safety first and you'll be fine!
Now good luck down there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh hey, the biochip! Nice going!
Now we can restore that missing data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You're just as good as I'd hoped, alien.
I knew you could do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
The original fault was mine,
and I apologize again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ha ha ha! Man, what a sap. Now let's see
what details of the alien's construction 
were collected by the biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_040.text: Well, would you look at this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
It would seem she's far more
compatible than anticipated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, you really have
a knack for showing up exactly when
I want you to. I love it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Do ye have another task for me?
