I'm happy to undertake it if so.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 056 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 056.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 056.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 056
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.text:
I cannot fight the beast. I would be slain
before any useful data could be collected.
Please go in my place, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, we can't have ye slain, love!
I'm happy to help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Ha ha! Wonderful! You've met my
expectations once again, alien. Anyway, we'll handle all the data collection
and numbers and all that nerd stuff, so you
just worry about the fighting. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 056 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Ye created a monster?
For what purpose?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.text:
There are various goals we pursue.
Isolating beneficial characteristics.
Engaging in potential domestication.
So forth and so on.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Yes, yes, it's all simply fascinating.
Now enough with the idle chitchat!
Let's get on with the fighting!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Apologies. Do ye have any combat advice
for me before I start, Mr. Overseer?
I assume ye have done this before.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Sadly, overseers aren't allowed to fight.
Too valuable, too hard to replace—you
know how it is right? Right. Sure you do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.text: This is the pen of Specimen 056.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.text:
C'mon, alien! Let's see some enthusiasm!
Hup, hup! Hoo-rah! Get 'er done!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.text:
And ye are certain I'm the
best candidate for this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.text:
I apologize. My failings led to this.
I wish you the best of luck.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 056!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Now get the data restored
already, Kat! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.text:
...For all her supposed suitability, she'd be
useless to us if she couldn't survive a battle
of that intensity—so I'm VERY glad to see
she passed the test! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Still, the other divisions don't seem to know
what we're attempting here—or maybe they do
and are just granting consent through silence? Eh, whatever. She's my alien now,
and I'll do whatever I want with her!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Is there anything else I can
help ye with then, love?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Er... Nope! All set for today, thanks.
Great job with the data recovery,
kudos and such, hip hip huzzah.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.text:
The Red Division Overseer appeared to be planning
something that involved me. I wonder why he's
unwilling to share such plans, especially as they
seem to affect all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.text:
I've not enough information to speculate,
so there's nothing for it but to get out
there and learn what I can.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 098 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 098.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 098.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 098
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 098 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.text: This is the pen of Specimen 098.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are—and we REALLY need
you to fight it so we can get our
first-encounter data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.text:
I mean, you know how it is when there's a
gap in consecutively numbered files, right?
Drives you crazy!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.text: I'll give it a proper thrashing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 098!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 507 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 507.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 507.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 507
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 507 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.text: This is the pen of Specimen 507.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.text:
How many different specimens
do ye keep on Delta Base?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Our numbering system is not indicative
of the total. Specimens are destroyed.
New varieties are discovered—including
cursed and artificially developed ones. I estimate there are roughly 75,000 in all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.text:
And yet your operations requires
data from just one or two of them?
Why is that, exactly?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Because it's only through the accumulation
of data that fundamental truths
become revealed! Sooo...the fighting? C'mon, let's go.
Very busy man over here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 507!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, am I ever in awe of
your knack for appearing at the right place
and at the right time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_01.text: Do ye need more battle data?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Not exactly. See, while we were attempting
to update our combat data on a particular
specimen, we experienced an unexpected
infestation of parasitic slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.text:
The slime mold is consuming all of our
monster specimens AND multiplying
at an almost unbelievable rate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Thing is, most of Red Division has been sent
offworld on official business, and we don't
have the strength to fight it. And yeah, sure, we could ask the
other divisions for help, but yuck!
Who wants to do that? Not me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Are ye certain about that, love?
I believe the saying 'any port in
a storm' would apply here, aye?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Noted. But in this case, the port
I have chosen is YOU, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I'm currently working up an analysis of the
slime mold's properties that I should have
finished up here shortly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.text:
So you're going to help us, right?
Sure you are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, alien? How about it?
Will you help us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.text:
We have come to understand a few
aspects of the slime mold's nature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.text:
We can obstruct its movements
with our electromagnetic gates.
These gates have been activated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.text:
You can deactivate individual gates
by using switches near containers.
However, they cannot be reactivated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, so our sensors picked up three swarms
of slimes. Or packs. Or, uh, whatever slimes
travel around in. Herds, maybe? Oh, and when this is all over,
there's a reward waiting for you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.text:
A reward is not necessary
to secure my assistance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.text: Oh, don't worry about it, love.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.text:
Is it truly wise for me to go along
with the overseer's plan?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_09.text: Aye, let's go kill some slime.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, this is just strange...
We've never seen this particular
variety of slime mold before!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.text: This should be the last of 'em!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.text:
This slime mold looks like your everyday
garden-variety stuff, but it's actually
some sort of new species or subspecies.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.text:
A discovery of this nature must be
reported to the other divisions.
This is correct, yes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, Kat! You and your rules! Look, involving the other divisions
is only going to complicate things.
Bureaucracy, paperwork, infighting...
Blech, am I right!? I'll just handle it myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.text: What is it ye are afraid of, love?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.text:
Look, outsider. There are all sorts of inter-
divisional tensions that you just don't get.
If I let them know about this, they'll see
us as weak—and I'm NOT letting that happen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.text:
Aye, I suppose such things would
be outside of my own experience.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.text:
We believe the slime mold has emerged from
the containment unit of Specimen 440,
Mr. Overseer, sir!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.text:
Specimen 440... Yes, of course.
Exactly as I suspected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.text:
The containment unit has been destroyed from
the inside, sir, and the slime mold seems to have
been feeding off of the specimen it contained.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.text:
We must report this at once.
Yellow Division must know.
Green Division must know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.text:
Slow down there, speedy!
We'll hold off on that report until we've
had time to conduct a full investigation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.text:
This is all going according to your plan,
isn't it? What is Specimen 440, and why
is it necessary to involve me in this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, I suppose you've earned
a few answers, my alien friend. Right as you arrived here, Specimen 440
woke up. But just as we were getting
ready to analyze its combat potential,
the slime mold infestation began.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.text:
We naturally suspected that your arrival
was connected to Specimen 440, but needed
actual evidence this was the case. And guess what? We were right!
The two are most definitely related.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.text:
You suspected my arrival was the cause,
but it could also be the power failure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.text:
Yes, that seems plausible. We were observing
whether or not the slime mold would react
to your presence, but so far we've seen
zero evidence of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.text:
Anyway, that's why we're going to need your
continued participation for just a teensy
bit longer! You're good with that, right?
Sure you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.text:
I cannae imagine any reason slime molds
would react to my mechanical body, but
I suppose we'll need to verify that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.text:
Sir, none of the characteristics of this
infestation match the data of known slime
molds in our database. I feel it would be
best to inform the other divisions.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand, soldier—well,
in the sense I acknowledge that
as your personal point of view.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.text:
Uh, thank you, sir? So should I issue
an official interdivisional report?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.text:
440 is a unique specimen,
and I'm not going to let the other
divisions start meddling with it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.text:
Why, if the specimen was destroyed,
all of my amazing plans for it
would amount to nothing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_07.text:
And I expect I am a part
of these amazing plans?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.text:
These plans, alien, are something I hatched
before I even became overseer. They have
nothing to do with your appearance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.text:
The slime molds are returning
to the containment unit!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.text:
I've confirmed the presence of Specimen 440.
Looks like that damn slime mold destroyed
the containment unit from the inside and
consumed all of its bodily tissue!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.text:
This containment unit 
is full of slime mold?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.text:
This unit contains a mummified human male.
The slime mold seems to be functioning as
tentacular appendages that are providing
nutrition to the mummy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.text:
Ye call it a mummy, but my sensors are picking
up a life sign beyond that of the slime mold.
Also, this life-form appears to have fused
with the slime mold in a bizarre fashion.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.text:
None of which makes it a monster! See, the slime mold activity was a clear sign
the mummy was preparing to rise from its
slumber—we just didn't expect it to happen
so quickly! Ugh. What a pain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.text:
Is that no something ye had
identified as a possibility?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.text:
I wish! But no, totally out of nowhere.
We need to bring that slime mold under
control, which means we have to fight
the thing again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_08.text: Ah. Which is where I come in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay! The slime mold has been brought
under control, which means we can
finally resume the experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.text:
I assume this experiment originally
involved updating your slime mold
combat data, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I DO so appreciate how much
of my time you save with your
quick grasp of these situations! You are indeed correct, alien. Also, I can tell
by the sarcasm in that last question that you may
be tiring of this, so let me just say that if you
refuse, I'll have to make Shi Kat do it instead.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_03.text:
I believe this task would be
far beyond his capabilities.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.text:
Oh, I know I wouldn't get the results
I wanted when poor Shi Kat was inevitably
turned into a pulsating pile of goo—but
I bet I'd end up with SOMETHING!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.text:
My analysis indicates that was a joke.
Just not a very funny one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.text:
I'm going to take that as a yes.
Now come on, alien! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
As always, alien, I'm grateful for your
cooperation. Let's start the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This could lead to another slime mold
infestation. We should enlist the
assistance of Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Mr. Kat, did I just hear you volunteer to help
us gather combat data in the alien's stead?
I mean, you ARE a member of Red Division,
so that would be the more preferable outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.text:
No, Overseer. I said nothing.
Good luck to you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! Let me start by explaining the
properties of the slime mold. Basically,
they function as a colony with the ability to
mimic the appearance and behaviors of a host.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.text:
This is new information.
What is its source?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Me! I know it because I was the one
who discovered this species. See, the objective of this experiment isn't just
to gather combat data: it's a second attempt at
an experiment I conducted over 3,000 cycles ago—
one thought to have ended in failure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.text:
The goal of that experiment was to acquire
stronger bodies by using parasitic slime
molds that could consume, fuse with,
and gain the powers of their hosts. We theorized that a host possessed of a
powerful will might be able to gain the
slime's powers while still retaining their
own autonomy after being consumed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.text:
But the experiment ended in failure,
and the test specimen was sealed away
inside this capsule. He is known as the Beast King—number 440.
We'd worked together as researchers countless
times, and he was the only member of Red Division
I ever considered to be a partner.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.text:
So ye lost a companion in an experiment that
took place over 3,000 cycles of base time ago?
What connection could your present experiment
possibly have with that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.text:
It has EVERYTHING to do with
this experiment, alien! You're strong—so strong, in fact, that when
the slime mold attempts to take control of you,
you may be powerful enough to resist it and
gain its ability for yourself! Also, if you end up being taken over by the
slime, the Beast King will be free of its control
and come back to life. See? Win-win!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Ye cannae seriously believe your friend
can come back to life after so much time
and trauma. That's just mad, love.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Specimen 440 is a colony of slime mold.
It is not the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Silence, insect! What do you know of the
Beast King and slime mold!? Nothing! Oh, but don't worry, alien! Should you end up
consumed by the slime mold, it will only be able
to fuse with the raw materials of your exterior,
so your core will live on. Neat, right? SO neat!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.text:
You must escape at once, alien.
The overseer's behavior has
become dangerously erratic.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.text:
Nae. I would have ye open the capsule
so I can destroy the slime mold and
end this daft experiment for good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! I LOVE it, alien!
You have such AMBITION! Now go! Do it! Fight that slime
mold and GIVE IT ALL YA GOT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.text:
You are certain, alien?
Then I will do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.text:
Oh, I'll do it, all right...
And there we go. Capsule open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.text:
So ye are the Beast King, aye? Although I
cannae say if it's really ye in that suit or
only a collection of slime mold, so I'll just
have to thrash ye proper and find out!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.text:
What!? No! Stop, you stupid slime!
You're supposed to attack the alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.text:
Specimen 440 is moving to another part
of the base. I speculate it is seeking
more suitable prey.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.text:
No! No, that's not it at ALL! Don't you see!? It's him! It's the Beast King!
He's looking for his beloved sword!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.text:
He has been arrested by decree of
our division council, and will likely
be dismissed from his duties soon.
I have been appointed acting overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_02.text:
And what of Specimen 440,
Mr. Acting Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.text:
We activated the electromagnetic gate
to keep it contained, but do not know
how long it will hold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.text:
A portion of the slime mold managed to slip
through the gate before it was activated.
We do not know its present location.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.text:
The previous overseer claimed
he was searching for his sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.text:
That sword is an artifact. 
Yellow Division is in charge of artifacts.
We should contact them about this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.text:
The electronic gate to the monster pens
has been broken. This is likely due to
the slime mold. I believe it is seeking
further prey to consume.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.text:
If we do not address this situation,
the monsters will be absorbed by the
Beast King. This will make him very
powerful. We will not be able to fight him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.text:
Perhaps it would make sense to destroy the
other monsters first—even though they've
done nothing to deserve such a fate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.text:
We should collaborate with Green Division.
They can gas the area. This will put the
monsters into a state of paralysis.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.text:
At which point even ye would
be able to manage them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.text:
Yes. This will prevent us from
losing any of our precious samples.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.text:
Please lower the electromagnetic gate
so I can reach the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you sure? Have you made
all the necessary preparations?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_03.speaker: HERO
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_03.text: Perhaps a wee bit more time...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.text:
Whoa, crazy. I can't believe the
Beast King's causing trouble again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.text:
Yeah, so a while back, somebody from Red
Division stole a cursed sword from us.
We all figured the Beast King was behind it,
but he always refused to admit it. Anyway, one day he up and died,
and we ended up getting it back.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.text:
I mean, stealing a cursed sword and
keeping it until you die? What a loon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.text:
I cannot speak to his motives,
but please allow Red Division to take
custody of that sword once more. A normal artifact container will not suffice.
It must be kept safe from the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh man, alien! You got yourself
mixed up in something weird again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.text:
Aye, love, I have—and I would
appreciate your assistance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.text:
No worries! One cursed sword,
coming right up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.text:
Question, love: why does everyone
refer to it as a 'cursed' sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.text:
Oh, because anyone who wields it is
cursed with horrible, never-ending pain!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.text:
Let's take the cursed sword with us;
we'll likely have to ask the previous
overseer to find out why the Beast King
stole it in the first place.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.text:
Incidentally, would I be able
to wield this sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_04.text: Have ye ever seen this sword before?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.text:
Yellow Division claims it was
stolen from them by the Beast King.
Why would he nick a cursed sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.text:
We calculated that the power of that sword's
curse prevented the slime mold from taking over
his consciousness—and we were RIGHT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.text:
The Beast King got the power of the slime mold
without being consumed by it, and it was
all thanks to that curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.text:
Sadly, the power of the curse ate away
at his mind and made him REALLY violent. Eventually we had to take the sword away,
at which point he was immediately consumed
by the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.text:
So when the Beast King wields the sword,
it weakens the slime mold. But then why
would he be seeking it now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.text:
Because his strong will is still working
AGAINST the slime mold. He wants to
reclaim the sword—and in doing so,
reclaim his very self! Please, you have to help him!
Give him that sword! I beg you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.text:
If it's a choice between battling a Beast King
possessed by slime mold and a cursed Beast King
who has control of his slime mold, I'd consider
the former to be preferable.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.text:
I'll entrust this sword to ye,
Mr. Acting Overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.text:
You'll not escape this time,
ye nasty Beast King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.text:
Here, Beast King! It's your sword!
Take it and reclaim yourself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.text:
Ach! What is the former
overseer doing here!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_440
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.text: I am the Beast King...and I am REBORN!

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_MON_KATANA_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_MON_KATANA_000_000.text:
The slime mold is now
effectively defeated.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_MON_KATANA_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_MON_KATANA_000_010.text:
He managed to free himself
of the slime mold at last.

SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_MON_KATANA_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_GIMK_DIVA_MON_KATANA_000_020.text:
Then it is time to defeat
the Beast King for good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.text: I'm terribly sorry to bother you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it's you. I received word of your request
from my researchers. We're happy to cooperate,
but take no responsibility for what happens
to your samples as a result of the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.text:
Hello again, alien. You seem to have quite
the habit of getting swept up in these
sorts of things, don't you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.text: I quite enjoy 'these sorts of things.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.text: Mags, help them prepare the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.text: I'll take care of this, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.text:
Once again, Mags,
I'm grateful for your aid.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.text: However, I hope ye will take great care to ensure this does not, for example, accidentally make the monsters more violent.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh, it certainly might! ...Er, sorry.
Did the overseer not make that clear?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.text:
Okay, the gas is ready. We can use the tank
on the lower level to disperse it throughout
the area, so let's get moving.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.text:
This is Green Division's gas tank.
Er, but it's primarily used for the
creation and cooling of fresh air,
and not for spreading poison.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.text:
The gas should have a sedative effect on the
monsters. We don't dare use anything close to
a lethal dose, because that might cause some
very big problems for the rest of the base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.text:
A wise decision. Our division is
composed of beings from a variety
of different species, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.text:
I hope ye are being canny here, love. 
Erring on the side of caution and all that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, the gas I derived from the
monophid seeds is in the tank.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.text:
All you gotta do now
is flip the switch!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.text:
It...worked? It WORKED!
Mags, you beautiful genius!
You've done it again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_10.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_10.text:
High self-esteem seems to be
one of Mags's strengths.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.text:
No, Beast King! Don't die!
You can't leave me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.text:
He survived 3,000 cycles of slime mold
possession. Have faith in his vitality.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.text:
...No! That's not good enough! I command you to eat me, slime mold!
Take your nourishment from me so
the Beast King might live again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.text:
It's happening! The consciousness of all
the life-forms the slime mold has ever
consumed are flowing into me! Ah! The Beast King is here too!
Oh, my friend, how I've missed you!
If only I'd known this back then!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Kat! I order you to seal us in that capsule
and number it 440A. Should a slime-removal
technique be discovered, you are to...to...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.text:
I owe you an apology for all we put
you through, alien. But now I must
ensure capsule 440A is properly sealed.
We will speak later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.text:
It appears this is what
the overseer wanted.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Greetings, alien. I apologize for involving
you in so many irregular situations.
I assure you the overseer and the Beast King
are now safely asleep in Capsule 440A.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand ye have officially been
appointed Red Division Overseer. Cheers!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.text:
A being like myself? Leading Red Division?
I cannot believe it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.text:
I viewed my predecessor as a reckless being.
A human too chaotic to even process his own data.
But I saw what happened to him in the end,
and realize the Beast King was his true friend. I have no one like that in my life.
I have no friends. I...envy him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Aye, we beheld the overseer's heart.
Sadly, I possess no such thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.text:
We would not have resolved this matter without
you, alien. You have set aside your own goals 
for the sake of Delta Base. We all thank you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.text:
I believe this is the reason I was guided
to Delta Base, so I'm grateful enough.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 056, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.text: This is not the monster we seek.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 098, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 507, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, hey! Welcome to Yellow Division, 
where we conduct research on the 
civilizations of various worlds. So you're an alien, right? Cool, cool.
The subjects of our research don't
usually come to us—or at least that's
what the division overseer told me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
My serial number is D05-72314.
I'm also known as Songstress Diva No. 5.
Who are ye? Also, is everyone in Yellow
Division a mech?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, if only! I'm Unit B888888, dispatched
from Administration to take over the
overseer's managerial duties. I'm actually the only robot assigned to
Yellow Division. Oh, and everybody here
calls me 'Bean.' Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The Yellow Division overseer has been in
pretty poor health lately, so he's resting
up at the medical facility. But the work doesn't care when a guy's sick,
and it just keeps pilin' up! That's why they
sent me here to help out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Which reminds me, I was supposed to
do something... Oh, right! Promptly
deliver the alien to the overseer.
Guess we better get on that. C'mon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, alien. I am pleased you've come
to visit us, and would like to ask you
many questions about your home world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Good day to ye, Mr. Overseer. My serial number
is D05-72314, and I am known as Songstress
Diva No. 5. I heard ye were in poor health;
are ye feeling better, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It appears you hail from a world rich in 
compassion—or so I gather from the fact
you are inquiring about the health of
a complete stranger. But let us start over, as in my
excitement I have quite shamefully
failed to introduce myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text:
I am indeed the Yellow Division overseer,
and my health is indeed rapidly worsening.
In truth, I do not know how much time I have. But perhaps my luck is turning, for here,
in my moment of deepest despair, you have
appeared—and through you, I will gain
all manner of new knowledge!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
I don't know if I'll be of any use to ye,
but I'll certainly make every effort.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
A moment, please. I haven't the strength
to absorb all you have to say. Bean, have you made preparations to
conduct a full research interview?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, about that. The research scientists
are still down in the lower-level archives,
so I couldn't put a plan together. Those guys! They probably got their noses
caught in some dusty old tome and lost all
track of time! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, I know what it's like to get lost in a good
book when ye have other tasks to attend to!
Still, if they've not returned, perhaps it's best
if I go to them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
You have my gratitude once more, alien,
and I find my interest in your world
deepening rapidly. Bean, would you be so kind as to
help the alien find the researchers?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I didn't want to worry the overseer,
but the researchers are actually studying
ancient cursed tomes. So, uh, they've
probably been cursed, is my guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.text:
I cannae be sure what ye mean by 
'cursed tomes,' but it sounds as if
we'd best get a wiggle on.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.text:
Splendid! I'll activate the lift and we
can go down together. Thanks for all
your help here, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I opened this ancient text purely out
of curiosity and was promptly cursed.
Now I can't move and everything hurts.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.text: The fiend that was sealed within the volume wishes to use my body in order to manifest itself in reality. And while that's likely going to be terribly unpleasant in the end, I am appreciating the opportunity to experience a curse firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Whoa! A fiend sealed in a tome is
manifesting itself through a curse?
We have to document this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.text: Should we not save them, though?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much. Now if you'll excuse me,
I need to go and document what happened back
at the division office.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Is everyone in Yellow Division so
passionate about their work?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.text: So the curse can also be lifted by slaying the associated fiend? I must document this! ...Urgh. Oh dear. While I'm happy the curse is lifted, I'm somehow in even more pain now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.text: He has no one to blame but himself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.text:
When I started reading this ancient tome,
it unleashed some manner of horrible curse.
Now I can't move. Ugh.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now THIS is interesting! It appears to be a
DNA conversion script that turns its reader
into a fiend! I've gotta try that sometime...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Curses seem an anachronism in a
technologically advanced place
such as Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.text: There are curses that function through mechanical engineering, you know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_060.text: I'm pleased to have been of service.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.text:
This is some extremely valuable curse
data! Time to download it to the ol'
memory banks...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.text:
It appears that by slaying the monster,
the DNA conversion reverses itself.
What an advanced curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm relieved to hear that, and hope
it means everyone will be all right.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.text:
The conversion script has disappeared!
Fight it again, please!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.text:
When we read the tome, our backs froze up
and we couldn't move. I surmise that we
have all been cursed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Guys, come on! You were sent here in a group
of three specifically so you could watch each
other and make sure no one looked at, read,
or opened anything!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Sorry, but...you know. Researchers?
Our curiosity got the better of us.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.text:
I understand the impulse; it can be
hard to walk away from a mystery!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Dear me. When curiosity overcomes
reason, things go terribly wrong.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.text:
So they understood the tomes
were cursed from the start?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Honestly, I didn't expect the curses
to take effect so quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.text:
We never should have
read those books.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Consider yourself lucky that slaying
those fiends lifted the curses!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Now that all of our researchers are safe,
it's time for me to head back and prepare
your qualitative research interview.
Thanks for your patience, friend!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.text: Aye, we had an interview scheduled.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Delta Base and curses... This has been
quite the invaluable experience!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.text:
Will you attempt to dispel
the curse for us, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.text: Are ye prepared for my interview?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, about that. When I reported the cursed
tomes incident to the overseer, he ordered me
to continue researching them, seeing as I'm
immune to curses and all. Anyway, looks like your interview is
gonna have to wait.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Are ye certain ye will be all right?
I know of no scientific foundation for
the claim that 'mechs cannae be cursed.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, why would you even say that!?
Are you TRYING to scare me here?
Of course I'm immune! ...Right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, I know very little about curses;
I'm simply worried for ye, love.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ugh. UGH. Now I'm just a nervous wreck about
this whole thing. But I can't say 'no' to an
overseer on his deathbed, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.text:
If anything goes pear-shaped,
I'll be here to help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, it's a scrap of paper.
Where did this come from?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_020.text:
This may be an item
of some significance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Good heavens! That looks like a page
from the mysterious tome known as
the Necronomicon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.text: I found it in a Red Division container.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes, that's a Necronomicon page, all right.
This is highly auspicious: that book is said
to tear out its own pages and grant good
fortune to whoever returns them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Might I have that page?
I'm DYING to test that theory!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.text:
That certainly piques my curiosity.
What manner of good fortune, I wonder?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Tsk! Should have just kept my mouth shut.
But if the Necronomicon flays your flesh
from your bones, don't come crying to me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.text: Should I return this page to the book?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.text: The book is in rather shabby condition.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_030.text: Nae, this is a silly idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Ach! My 'good fortune' seems
to consist only of a punch-up!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello. Is this some manner
of laboratory, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure is! How was an alien like
yourself able to discern that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.text:
It was an easy assumption to make when
the entirety of Delta Base seems to be
composed of nothing but such places.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Researching a variety of worlds is Delta Base's
entire purpose. And here in Yellow Division,
our research is focused on the civilizations
found in each of the conjoined worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
And I take it ye are the
Yellow Division overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Close! I am Advanced Office-work Model B888888,
dispatched by the Administrative Division to
handle the organizational duties of Yellow
Division's current overseer. Oh, and everybody here calls me 'Bean.'
Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
So here's the thing, alien: I've been ordered
to bring you to the overseer the moment you
arrive, but...I don't really want to.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Are ye able to ignore
direct orders, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Not really, no! And since I have to prioritize
orders without regard for my own feelings,
I suppose we're off to see the overseer. But before we go, let me fill you
in on a little something first:

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Due to a recent illness, the overseer
has become excessively paranoid. And between you and me, I bet he's
going to think you've come here to
reclaim the cultural artifacts taken
from your world by Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Diva_No5

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
That's great! But it breaks my heart to hear you
express so little interest in cultural artifacts.
Please do be more careful about how you frame
such things in the overseer's presence, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.text:
There you are, alien!
From which world do you hail?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_010.text: I come from the city of Avalon.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.text:
Avalon? Ah! Then you've come to
reclaim the sword that was so
carelessly dumped in a lake! Do you have any idea how much trouble it was
to stea—Er, retrieve that from the lady of
said lake? And now you think you can just
waltz in here and steal it back from us!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.text:
Ownership of the sword was forfeited when it
was returned to the lake; Avalon has no basis
under existing law to claim possession of the
article in question.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.text:
I am pleased to hear that. But to come all
the way from Avalon and leave without
beholding the sword would be a fate far
too cruel for words!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.text:
Bean, you will permit this alien to
view the sword—under the strictest
of supervision, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.text:
Your response sure made the overseer happy,
alien—I haven't seen him look so satisfied
in quite a long time. In fact, he's been nothing but ill-tempered
lately, much to the sorrow of everyone in
Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Anyway, I need to make a follow-up report
to the overseer, so please go view the
sword in question regardless of your
actual level of interest in the matter.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm aware of legends regarding the sword,
although I don't know all of the details.
That said, I'm chuffed to see this sword
which fascinates your overseer so!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.text:
So you weren't merely patronizing him!?
Oh! In that case, let's go view the sword.
I'll activate the lift to the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Why is the sword in pieces? Was it
broken for research purposes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I assure you that this is not our doing;
the sword was originally created to separate
in this fashion, and for now it must remain
in this disassembled state.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
He's right! The moment you appeared here,
alien, this sword started to vibrate.
These vibrations triggered a dimensional
resonance that caused energy forms to appear.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.text:
By which Bean means monsters. Yet by separating
the sword's pieces, we can lessen its resonance
and weaken the energy forms it spawns—making
the monsters smaller, in other words. And that's why we're keeping the thing in
pieces while we investigate the source.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Does that not indicate a connection between
myself and this sword? It seems unlikely to
be a coincidence, at any rate; perhaps your
overseer had good reason to worry.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.text:
When disassembled, a pattern resembling words
appears on the surface of the blade. We believe
this has some sort of supernatural or ceremonial
significance, but that's still being investigated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.text:
...Oh dear. It seems an energy form has
found us. Bean, could you do something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.text:
The appearance of the fiends and the
sword must be related. Let's investigate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
What shape was the sword while intact?
I cannae mentally reconstruct it from
the various pieces.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.text: Sadly, that's not exactly an easy thing to describe. Based solely on its appearance, one would hardly surmise it was a weapon at all. However, one could definitely sense a sort of power contained within it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Was the sword in an advanced
state of decay, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, nothing of the sort! See, the technology here in Delta Base let us restore it to a flawless state. Er, although we did lose possession of it for a bit after that...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.text:
But we haven't performed any sort of in-depth
study since it was returned to us. Honestly,
the only reason we're even looking at the
thing now is because you showed up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.text:
Aye, I suppose it may all be a coincidence—
nevertheless, it may still lead ye to a
deeper understanding of this relic.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Hey, I getcha! Although, again,
it's entirely possible this is
unrelated to your being here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Say, uh, Bean? I think we're about to
have another energy form on our hands.
Can you take care of it, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Have ye been able to decipher
the inscription on the blade?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
It clearly indicates that something will happen
when the sword is reassembled, but the risk of
doing so is too great until we find a way to
stop the vibration.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.text: Got any ideas on that front?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.text:
We're attempting to negate the vibration by
reversing the characters of the inscription,
but we haven't been able to focus on the task
with all the energy forms running about.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, no worries!
We can handle that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears that if we create a replica with
the inscription reversed, it will conversely
absorb the vibrations—which will let us safely
continue our research on the upper level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.text:
I will let you handle
the rest, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.text:
When the energy forms disappear, their energy
flows back into the sword—which means the
sword itself may be a kind of generator. We need to study it further once
we have the other pieces.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.text:
Can you take care of that
for us, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.text:
So this sword isn't actually a weapon.
While it may have been used as one,
that was never its intended function. But as to what its proper function
actually is, we don't yet know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.text:
Regardless, this sounds like a fruitful
avenue of study, don't you think?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.text:
These pieces should allow us to reassemble
the sword. We can then show it to the alien
in accordance with the overseer's orders.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.text:
I appreciate your patience, alien!
Don't worry, we'll have this thing
patched back together in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.text:
Aw, don't be like that! Just take a
look once it's put back together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.text:
We finished restoring the sword, alien!
Come take a look!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_010.text:
What just happened, love?
It's in pieces again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, I'm sure you of all people remember
what it's supposed to look like, right? That's why I'm taking you to the artifact-
restoration workshop so you can experience
the restoration duties of a Yellow Division
member firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_040.text: I want no part of your pranks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.text:
Splendid work! And with this, I can officially
say that I've followed the overseer's order
to show you the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, and there's MORE good news! The repair of
the sword seems to have made the overseer feel
better; he intends to return to work and
study the sword's true purpose personally!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_070.text:
I'm pleased to hear of the
overseer's improving health.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.text:
Hey, so you also seem to have something of an
interest in the sword's true nature, right?
If so, you should join us in our research!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.text: I would very much like that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.text:
There seems to be a piece left over.
But how? It all fit together flawlessly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.text:
As I cannae conceive of a plausible
explanation, I will keep it for now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.text:
Ack! No! I don't know if I'll be able
to put it back together again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello. Is this a research center
of some sort, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.text: Perhaps ye did not hear me inquiry?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Hmm. This mech appears to have sufficient
energy, and I see no signs of damage.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Fully functional, thank you! However, I have been ordered to ignore the
alien—which is you—and would appreciate you
not interfering with that, especially since
you are FAR more assertive than I expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, as a fellow mech, I feel I can speak
to ye freely. May I inquire about your
orders to ignore me, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The Yellow Division overseer ordered the
entire division not to engage with the alien—
and as his administrative surrogate, I had
no choice but to follow said order. Oh, and please don't ask me why he issued that
order, because I have ZERO idea. Frankly, I feel
like chatting with you is a wonderful opportunity
for cultural exchange!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, if ye have to ignore me, so be it.
Apologies for the trouble.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.text: I suppose this could all be cleaned up if you spoke to the overseer, but he's been in poor health for quite some time and is currently being treated in the medical facility. And while visitors aren't expressly forbidden, it won't be easy to get in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Ack! I didn't expect she'd pursue
him right into the hospital!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm here to see the overseer
of Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
The Yellow Division overseer is I, alien!
Now why have you come!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
If I have done something that displeased ye,
I apologize. But I'd appreciate if ye might
tell me what I did wrong so I don't make
the same mistake again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Your visit here has put the entirety of 
Delta Base in danger, alien—which is why
I want you to complete your objective and
leave as quickly as possible. And as far as Yellow Division saw it,
ignoring you seemed like the best way
to achieve that outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
I've only come here in search of my heart,
but am unsure how to proceed with the search.
Perhaps ye might be good enough to assign
your administrative mech to aid me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
As per that discussion, I now request your
assistance. My serial number is D05-72314,
and I am known as Songstress Diva No. 5.
Who are ye?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I am B888888, but the members of Yellow
Division refer to me as 'Bean.'
Also, I never imagined you'd be so pushy
about all of this! Sheesh!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
How would ye suggest I pursue
a search for my heart, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.text:
I don't know about your heart specifically,
but there's all sorts of interesting stuff
on the base's lower level. Let's take the
Yellow Division lift and I'll show you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.text:
That's a spriggan! Which is not particularly
