interesting in and of itself, but the gem
it's munching on is a philosopher's stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.text:
And a philosopher's stone will
help me acquire my heart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Maybe? Who knows! But heck,
it's worth a shot, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.text:
That is not a spriggan. Ergo, what it's
chewing on is not a philosopher's stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_010.text: And this will let me find my heart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.text: Oh, no. I mean, they're powerful, but not that powerful. You'd need a lot more philosopher's stones to find a heart.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Don't get discouraged, though! There are
still plenty of spriggans left to fight.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.text: Sounds like you're rarin' to go.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.text: And this will let me find my heart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.text:
No, still not enough—but there are
plenty more spriggans left to fight!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.text:
I see another spriggan, but these philosopher's
stones seem to be nothing but rocks, and I'm
starting to doubt if any of this will help me
find my heart.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.text:
Well you're dead wrong about that!
Mark my words, these stones are
brimming with tasty power.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.text:
C'mon, kiddo! How can we know it won't work
before we try it? Also, I don't even know
what a heart is. I'm a mech, remember?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Aye, I suppose that's true... I'm sorry, love. My heart has nothing to do
with ye, and it was wrong of me to make ye
help me find it. I will continue to gather
the philosopher's stones.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.text: And I'll be right beside you, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, thanks a bunch! Now we've gathered
all the pieces of the philosopher's stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_010.text:
It almost looks like they fit
together into something larger?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_040.text: They merged into a single stone!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.text:
If you put all the pieces in the
correct place, the stone returns
to how it used to be! Yes, the philosopher's stone has some real magic,
all right. Er, but they don't snap together
by themselves, so you have to do it manually.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_060.text:
Brilliant! I'd like to try that,
if ye don't mind.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.text:
Whoa! I never imagined an alien like you would
possess such capabilities! Why, this could lead
to significant advances in our understanding of
the philosopher's stone, so thanks for that!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.text:
Apologies, but I don't seem to possess
the functionality necessary for this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.text:
If it's so difficult that even a Bean
Model-8 like myself struggles to put
it back together, it's no surprise
that you couldn't do it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.text:
Let's take this philosopher's stone topside.
Come see me after I've finished restoring it,
and we'll see if it leads us to your heart.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.text:
There's still a piece of the stone
left over, but how?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.text:
Perhaps this is simply how philosopher's
stones work? I'll just keep this, then.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll bring the pieces of the philosopher's stone
back, and then we can get to work on your
little spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.text:
Good news, alien! I reported our latest
adventures to the overseer and handed
over the philosopher's stone you fixed. I thought for sure he'd be mad at me,
but he actually praised me instead! It seems
his whole 'ignore the alien' order has been
completely forgotten.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm chuffed to have been of service,
especially if your overseer is happy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Regardless, it is no longer necessary
for you to quickly conclude your
business and leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
I've been told by the overseer to begin
preparations for our next experiment.
The search for your heart will have to wait.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Aye, then I'll look elsewhere
in Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I bring good tidings, alien! The overseer's
health has improved, and he'll officially
be resuming his duties today!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Are ye sure ye aren't straining
yourself too hard here, love?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
While I admit I'm pushing myself somewhat,
the mental anguish from staying cooped up
in that medical facility would be far worse
for me in the long run. Now then, Bean. Isn't there an
additional piece of news to share?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Indeed there is! We've had a breakthrough
in our research into the cursed tomes,
and now know it's connected to our
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of
both locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
So it's a skeletal frame like the ones
Bean and I possess. Also, ye mentioned
it is connected to the cursed tomes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, right! See, when I read through the
ancient tomes to verify their contents,
I wasn't cursed in the same way the
fleshy researchers were. Instead, the transformative functions of
the tome activated my internal mechanisms!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I cannae detect any change in your output
levels. What specifically was activated?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Whaaat? You can't even tell that
my processing speed has tripled!? No, that's a joke. I was already
fully activated, so there was no
visible effect.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: But it did give us the idea of using the tome's curse on the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! And upon further investigation, we found numerous commonalities that suggest the specimen and cursed tomes are connected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
In summation, we believe the curse
in the ancient tomes is, in fact,
an activation command for the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.text:
It's incredible that ye were able to connect
two seemingly unconnected artifacts like that!
This never would have been found had Yellow
Division not been so passionate about research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Oh, but our research doesn't end with
this revelation, alien! We intend to
use the curse to attempt to activate
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Well, whether this works or not,
the important thing is that we try.
Isn't that right, Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Exactly so, Bean. I appreciate how you
have a wonderful way of saying things
I often struggle to express. Now then, alien. If you are ready,
I would very much like you to witness
our grand experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.text:
All necessary preparations
have been made.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.text: Alien! We must speak of the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.text: Are ye feeling better then, love?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.text:
My physical condition is irrelevant!
All that matters is that the sword is
innately connected to the Orichalcum
Skeletal Specimen! Now tell me everything you know about
the specimen, and do not lie!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.text:
I've no entries regarding an Orichalcum
Skeletal Specimen in my database.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is a
skeleton created from a rare metal
called orichalcum.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.text:
It contains means of both locomotion and
communication, and we believe it to be an
anatomical model of an exoskeletal life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't play dumb with me, alien!
I know you really came here to recover
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! But as I'm about to prove, we have already
solved its mystery—and we have no intention
of returning it to you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.text:
I don't understand what's happening, so it's
probably best I leave. I apologize if anything
I did has upset your overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.text:
No! Please don't say that!
Just come observe this one experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.text:
But that would only make your overseer
more angry—and while that doesn't
especially bother me, it would only
add to his current health issues.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.text:
But if something goes wrong with the experiment,
Yellow Division will need help dealing with it—
and the overseer is too proud to seek aid from
the Administrative or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.text:
But are ye not from the
Administrative Division?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Sure, but I'm sort of a special case because
I was involved with reassembling the sword.
Please help me here! I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_160.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_160.text: I need to think about this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.text: I appreciate you even considering it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.text:
Please help me out here, alien!
I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.text:
A moment, alien! I heard what happened with
the philosopher's stone. Your hard work was very
much appreciated, and I apologize for suggesting
you might bring misfortune to Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.text:
As I gazed upon the restored stone,
I suddenly recalled the Orichalcum 
Skeletal Specimen whose study we had
neglected for so many years. I was struck with an intuitive sense 
that this was the key to its mystery!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_030.text:
What is an Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen?
I've no such entry in my database.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of both
locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.text:
I believe we can use the power of the
philosopher's stone to set the skeletal
model in motion, giving us valuable clues
into the civilization that created it. Oh, but I could not be more
excited about the prospect!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The experiment's all ready to go, alien,
so we're hoping you might do us the
honor of observing it with us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So this is the skeletal specimen?
How interesting. It looks rather
mechanical to me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure does, doesn't it!? But that strong
mechanical appearance is an aspect our
cultural researchers had to shed their
preconceived assumptions about. See, because whoever made the specimen
clearly felt it was skeletal in nature,
not mechanical.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Now let us begin the activation of
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! I will read from the cursed tome.
That way, should anything go wrong,
the sacrifice will be mine alone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
For when I said I had recovered, that was
a lie. One way or the other, this will be
my final duty for Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The curse... I can feel it...
Agh! Such...pain! But I must continue! Before long, 
the transformation...should...begin...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Ach! He collapsed! The transformation
was clearly too much for him, Bean—
ye have to stop the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.text: Oh wow! That was the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Ah, of course! I am now inside
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! As I suspected, the curse was never a curse
at all, but merely a way for the people of
that world to transfer themselves into a
new exoskeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Nice job, Overseer. The experiment was a
success! Now please share your observations
with us so we can take notes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
I am gradually beginning to understand how
this skeleton works. At the brink of death,
I have been freed from my withered, useless
body and awakened inside a new one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
You're blowing my mind here, Overseer!
I mean, with that new skeleton, you might
be able to live on forever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Aye, the overseer seems to have become
a being more akin to ye and myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Hmm? Who are you? What are
all of you doing in...?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Overseer? What's happening?
Who are you talking to?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.text:
No... No! I'm not alone in this body!
There are hundreds—no, thousands
of others...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Uh-oh. The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is attempting to access Delta Base's
information networks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Correct... Cannot defy the majority...
Cut us off... Protect...Delta...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.text:
I don't understand what's happening inside
that skeleton, Bean! What should we do!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.text:
I am acting as fast as my
processors allow, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.text:
The specimen intends to use the overseer's
knowledge to take over Delta Base. You must
physically cut Yellow Division off from the
network in order to protect it. I will attempt to interfere with the
specimen's communications systems
in order to buy you time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.text:
I'll work as fast as I can,
alien, but please hurry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.text:
For so many years, the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen has stood as a great mystery even
within Yellow Division's varied collection. But now, its connection to the reassembled
sword is clear: we can expect that the
interdimensional energy pulses released by
the blade will activate its skeletal frame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Now, let us begin the experiment.
Bean, do not forget to document
everything. And...begin resonating!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, it is exactly as predicted...
As the sword and I resonate together,
so too does the skeletal frame. This sword is the key that bonds
the skeleton to its wielder.
Increase the resonance!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The overseer has collapsed. We must stop
the experiment; his physical condition
is not sufficiently recovered for this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Uh-oh. That voice is coming from the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen, but it
sounds like the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Correct, Bean. I am now within the specimen.
Or perhaps it would be more accurate to say
that the specimen is now I? Behold, alien! I have achieved the full
integration with the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen which you could not!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.text:
As I told ye, I have no data pertaining
to the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.
This experiment is over—please return
to your body before ye cannae do so.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm going to infiltrate the core systems
of Delta Base and take control of all of its
functions! Such a feat will be a simple task
inside my new body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Once I am in full command of Delta Base,
I will begin my advance into all the other
worlds, thereby bringing their civilizations
under my control as well!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Bean, I believe the overseer has confused the
capabilities of the skeletal system with his
own objectives, committing the cognitive error
of conflating means with motivations.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Sorry! I'm currently in the process of
diverting all the skeleton's connection
requests through me in hopes of slowing
his access to Delta Base's systems!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.text:
In the meantime, we should stop the skeletal
specimen in order to protect Delta Base.
Please maintain your efforts until I am
able to complete that task, love.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.text:
This skeletal specimen does have few points 
of commonality with the skeletons of living
beings—it must have been developed to suit
particular physical constraints.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I'd love to know what sort of civilization
these people created—and I bet reactivating this
skeleton will tell us all about it! The overseer
is a genius for thinking up this plan!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Thank you, Bean. And now that I have the
philosopher's stone, let us begin our activation
of the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.text:
It was a wise choice to build the frame
out of orichalcum. It is extremely durable,
yet adaptable enough to meet the needs
of multiple civilizations. However...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.text:
He's speaking as though he is the one
who designed the skeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.text:
We didn't have the energy source to power
the orichalcum frame, and so were only
able to operate it briefly. Now that we have the philosopher's stone,
however, its power should ensure a
sufficient duration of operability.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now online.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.text: The overseer has been pulled into it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Analyzing all information... Overseer...
Yellow Division... Delta Base...
Organizational structure... Analysis complete. Placing Delta Base
under our authority.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Uh-oh! The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is
attempting to access Delta Base's information
network! Attempting to cut off accyrk•#

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Infiltrat*t5 Delta $9wBase netwo4u@%*8$ym.
Please physically sever Yellow Divisio*5n
from netw0r# to protect Delta Ba3&^j.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.text:
This appears to be a control panel.
I can simply sever the power to it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.text:
There are still two connections to sever.
Considering the size of Delta Base,
I should be able to make it in time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.text:
One more connection to sever.
Adequate time remains.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.text:
Lovely! That should protect anyone from
taking full control of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, but I do hope Bean is all right.
I should return to him at once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.text:
Are ye all right, love? All of Yellow
Division should be cut off now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.text:
Confirming isolationlationlationlation...
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen sevevevevered...
...Hmm? My processessessing speed appears to
be dropping. Initiating reboooooot...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.text:
Bean, what do we do about the skeletal specimen?
...Bean? Oh my days, but this is a proper mess!
His reboot is going to take too long.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.text:
I cannae afford to leave the
specimen in operable condition.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.text:
&j823 network #2uf&& secured.
Plea$3se stop ^4r6 Orich*1hym
Sk3#4tal Specim*n.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.text:
How do I stop it, Bean?
Must I use physical force?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.text:
If we lifted the curse, the transformation
should reverse and return the overseer
to his former body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Alas, that does not appear to be the case.
That curse truly was a curse—or perhaps it
was a punishment. This body is a prison. I will be
captive here forever, with no hope
of escape or death.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.text:
There is no reason ye must accept
such a punishment, Mr. Overseer.
I'm sure there's a way to get ye out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.text:
Thank you for saying so, alien. However,
I am now able to visualize the culture that
felt it necessary to create such a prison. Once I am able to communicate with the others 
trapped in here, I look forward to continuing
my research. Therefore, I view this not as a
punishment, but as an opportunity.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen will soon
shut down and enter an eternal slumber.
Thank you, alien. Farewell, Bean.
Glory to Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't blame yourself for this, alien:
the die was cast the moment the overseer
transferred himself into the skeleton. In fact, you were right to put
a stop to it when you did!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Bean, what is this I'm experiencing? I'm not
supposed to be expressive in this condition,
and yet something inside of me... Wait, is this my heart!? Have Delta Base and
your overseer guided me to my heart!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.text:
This experiment is over, love.
Please return to your body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.text:
Vile alien! I will never permit the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen to fall
into your treacherous hands!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.text:
I did not anticipate he would self-destruct.
And while it was not my intent, he clearly
felt pressured by me to do this thing.
Oh, but I feel just terrible!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.text:
Don't blame yourself, alien.
That sort of paranoia has always been
part of the overseer's general nature. Between his sickness and his advanced age,
I'm guessing he just couldn't hold it
back anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.text:
Plus, who knows what effect the
sword and skeleton had on him?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.text:
Ye think the sword and skeleton
took over his consciousness, then?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.text:
I think it's a strong possibility, sure.
But I'd like to reassemble both artifacts
to investigate them further.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.text:
That sounds like a rather
time-consuming process.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's a trivial matter for the researchers
of Yellow Division. In fact, that's just the
sort of thing they live for!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.text:
This experiment is over, love.
We must end it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.text:
I was ensnared by the power
of the philosopher's stone and
set these events in motion. To everyone in Yellow Division, I am
deeply sorry. My behavior has been a
disgrace to all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.text:
And yet, alien, this all came to pass because
of your presence. Had you not come here,
I never would have touched the stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.text: Forgive me for saying so, Overseer, but this all would have happened eventually even without the alien! In fact, her being here saved us all from a much greater disaster!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Heed me, all members of Yellow Division!
You are to have nothing to do with the alien!
That is my final order.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.text:
The philosopher's stone is running out
of energy... Ah, but this is a surprise...
I expected it to last longer...

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
has gone offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.text:
And sorry, alien, but until a new overseer
is chosen, the orders of the former one
have to remain in effect—which means I
won't be able to help you anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.text:
It seems the overseer despised me to the end.
Still, I wonder if I will ever find my heart?
Ah, well. I suppose this is farewell, love.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the cell where the overseer
said an alien was being held.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I sense no life signs here.
Perhaps the alien has already perished?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I told you, I need no energy replenishment!
I am an advanced model with a quantum
battery, remember?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.text:
So ye are a mech as well? How grand!
I am serial number D05-72314,
known as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.text: Diva models have humanoid bodies—two arms, two legs, and a head. So if you're a Diva, why do you look like that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Ye are familiar with Diva models, then?
Do ye know where I was created?
Or what my functions are?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Has your memory been destroyed?
Because a robot with no memories
belongs on the scrap heap.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Nae, my memories are there;
some functions are merely sealed away.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Stealing the memories of a mech is
a heartless thing to do! What monster
did this to you, and why?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I don't know, love; that's all within my sealed
memories. All I recall is that I discarded my
former body, fled that world, and am now in
search of my heart.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Your heart? Ah. Because if you reclaim it,
the seal on your functions will be broken
and you'll regain full memory access.
But what was the purpose of all that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Diva models are designed to be entertainers.
To delight large crowds of people.
That's what you are, Diva.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Ah, but it's been long and long since
I've heard a Diva model sing.
Might you grace me with a song?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Nae, I don't possess the functionality
to sing in front of someone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Then it's a powerful seal indeed.
Breaking it will not be easy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.text: My situation is the opposite: I ventured into the Conjoined Worlds specifically to seal away some of my functionality, and ultimately arrived here at Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_180.text:
You see, I determined it best that certain
of my functions not be utilized, which is
why I have holed up in this cell. However,
my voluntary confinement is now at an end.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Oh, I've an urge to test out
my functionality once more.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Of what functionality do ye speak?
Can ye at least give your serial number?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_000_CUT_000_220.text:
Oh, I'm no one who merits an introduction.
Goodbye, songstress. It's a shame—I would
have dearly loved to hear you sing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.text:
So I'm an entertainer...
Can that really be possible?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_001_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_OLD_001_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh! It seems that mech
left something behind.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Connection_Operator
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Alert! Alert! An unapproved external
connection has been made from outside
the connectivity gate.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Impossible. No one has forced their
way through the connectivity gate
for 15,462 cycles.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
External lock disengaged.
Our commands are being overridden.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
All security teams, assemble at the
connectivity gate! Anti-alien protocols
have been initiated!

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
This place is known as Delta Base.
Hopefully you can find at least
a little of your heart here.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Delta Base does seem to be
a place that suits me well.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Hullo. My serial number is D05-72314.
and I'm known as Songstress Diva No. 5.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Scanning. Trespasser does not match
known records of Delta Base members.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.text: Seems I wasn't built on this world.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
The alien will be interrogated by the
Council of Overseers. They will decide
how to deal with you.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
If I truly can be dealt with,
I would be most grateful.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.text:
The fate of captive aliens is determined
by the Detention Division. With infiltrating
aliens, however, the Council of Overseers
has jurisdiction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.text: And if we fail to reach consensus?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.text:
If you entrust the matter to
the Administrative Division,
we will handle disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal sounds good to me—where does trash
belong but in the trash can? Then we can pretend
this unapproved external connection never
happened and all walk away happy.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.text:
If we simply ignore what happened,
it could easily pave the way to
our own destruction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.text:
This incident also calls our own ethics into
question. How can we allow ourselves to intrude
upon other worlds if we refuse to grant the
same privilege to others?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.text:
The thing won't shut up about finding
its 'heart' here, if you can believe that.
And you overseers are taking it seriously?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.text:
What specifically are you searching for?
Meaning, what would you need to discover
for you to be satisfied that you'd found 
this 'heart' of yours?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.text:
I don't know. I don't even know how to go
about my search, or what a heart even is.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.text:
I don't believe I've ever encountered a robot
in the midst of an existential crisis before.
It's actually rather fascinating.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.text:
The Administrative Division will
assign a monitor to the alien, and it
will be allowed to search for its heart.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.text:
Understood. As the Administrative
Division's representative, I will
assign a monitor to the alien.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.text:
I'm Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I ask that you complete your task quickly,
alien, as I have little free time to spare.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.text:
As this does not appear to be my world
of origin, I'm not sure how to proceed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Council of Overseers has granted
you permission to search for your heart,
and that is all you are allowed to do.
Is this understood?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Aye, of course. But all the divisions are
asking for my help, and I'm ever so curious
about the various things they're up to.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
'Curious' is not an appropriate reaction for
someone who is merely seeking their heart.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
So what is this 'heart' you're looking for?
Some kind of mechanical component, maybe?
A new logic board? Or is it all just data?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I don't know, love. If I did, I could
calibrate my sensors more effectively.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
How do you expect to find something you can't
even identify? You'd better clarify your goals
if you want to stop wasting everyone's time.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, YOU'VE certainly been wandering
all over the place. Have you found this
wayward heart of yours, yet?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I had a variety of experiences that provided
new data, but I don't know if that constitutes
a 'heart.' I ask ye for a wee bit more time
to remain here in Delta Base.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text: I'm not the one who gets to make that call, but since I haven't had anyone telling me to hurry you up, I suppose it's fine. Although watching your search has got me wondering about my own heart...

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
It's time to bring an end to our search here
on Delta Base; if any more incidents were to
occur, I fear we might end up in a cell.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm sorry. I done nothing but cause
all kinds of trouble.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, don't worry your pretty metal head
about that. It's all part of the process
of finding one's heart.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Administrator, I'm ready to 
leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Wow, this is coming out of nowhere.
What about your heart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank ye for all your help. Because of ye,
I feel I've come to understand a wee bit
more about my heart. I wish you well.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Nae, I'll be fine. My scanners will
indicate the ideal path to travel.
But have ye ever left Delta Base
and gone outside, love?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Members of the Administrative Division
do not leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I have served the same role in the
Administrative Division since the moment
I was born, and will continue to do so
until all my higher functions cease. It took 8,000 cycles before I was promoted and
made an administrator—which is regarded as an
unusually fast ascent—and I have now served
as said administrator for over 5,000 cycles.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
If I were to join your journey,
do you think I would be able
to find my own heart?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I don't know—but let's search for our hearts
together! The more sensors working toward
the goal, the better the odds of success.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Ach! Someone is coming.
I'd best depart at once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Understood. I will accompany
you and see the outside.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.text:
Entry not found in Delta Base registry.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.text:
Aliens must be monitored at all times.
Please follow all applicable rules.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I hear you have come in search of a 'heart.'
Does such a thing truly exist here?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.text:
You have got to be kidding me right now! My coworkers are envious of my having been
given the 'easy' role of a monitor, but I fail
to see what is so enviable about it—for when it
is done, I will still have piles of missed work.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Pssst! You can trust me with your true secret
objective for coming here, alien. Are you a
spy sent from another base? Or a saboteur?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
It seems ye have been calibrated
to be quite imaginative, love!
But nae, I not a spy or saboteur.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Oh? Well, but what about you having been
sent to us by another base? Was I correct
about that part?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal? Are you nuts!?
That would be a huge waste! Look, I'm sure we can find some use for the alien.
Maybe it could teach in Yellow Division's Academy
of Foreign Cultures? Oh, or we could use it as
breeding stock for Green Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.text:
Yellow Division wants nothing
to do with this.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.text:
First of all, kindly stop referring to our
life-cycle research specimens as 'stock.'
Secondly, we have no plans to use the alien
in any of our research.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.text:
Seriously? You're gonna let a chance
like this slip through your fingers? Well, if you're really not interested,
I'm sure you won't object if we in
Red Division put the alien to good use!

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.text:
Listen up, alien! Until you mend your
broken heart or whatever it is you're
doing, you can remain on Delta Base.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.text:
Assign it a caretaker from the
Administrative Division, would you?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.text:
A monitor, you mean? Yes, we'll
ensure it's assigned a monitor.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, and I have been
assigned as your monitor. But as I have no
interest whatsoever in monitoring you,
feel free to do as you please.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.text:
Just don't cause any trouble. If anything
goes wrong, I'm the one who's going to
be chewed out by my bosses.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.text: Good. That's what I like to hear.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.text: I find it to be surprisingly normal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.text:
I hereby declare today to be Alien
Appreciation Day! Hip hip, huzzah!

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.text:
All right, that's more than enough of...
whatever this is. This alien isn't some
amusingly exotic species—it's a terribly
dangerous life-form. For all we know, it's swarming with germs
and pathogens. It may even seek to destroy
us through cultural pollution or weapons
of mass destruction that it smuggled in. But do not worry: the Administrative
Division is on top of the matter.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.text:
Greetings. I am Administrator Gold,
and I will be your attendant. ...Attendant to an alien. Wow.
I'm probably never going to
have a duty like this again.

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.text:
Do visitors not often come
to Delta Base, then?

SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.text:
It has never happened in all the cycles I
have been here, which makes this all rather
exciting. So welcome to Delta Base, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, alien.
Everything's ready for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
So you'll be my combat training instructor,
then? It's a pleasure to meet you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Me? An instructor? Hah!
Nice one—I like your sense of
humor. Anyway, let's get to it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Ah, so this is a battle simulator, is it?
I'm relieved I dinnae have to fight you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Hey, I'm game to throw
down if you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_001_CUT_000_000.text:
The next one I've got lined
up for you will be a blast.
Want to give it a go?

SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_DIVA_BATTLE_002_CUT_000_000.text:
That's all the training I've got lined
up for you. Good luck out there.
